informations.text:
Let's start with a little 
introduction

The above panel 
will give little instructions 
if you need.

Here, you can see 
how much time you have 
for a patient

Here, 
with the button at the corner, 
you can see patient history 
anytime

When you pressed OK, 
the game will start 
automatically. 
Good Luck!

Choose 2 or 3 treatments that 
you think more appropriate 
for the current patient 
by selecting/deselecting.

Here, you can choose 
a treatment to 
start explaining.

You'll complete 
the explanation with 
the choices given.

After initial explanation, 
you can give more detail 
with this panel.

Choose a treatment to start 
negotiating on it 
with the patient.

You can eliminate or prescribe 
any treatment, anytime 
with the buttons next to them.
